channel.title: R on Jac TM Davis
channel.description: Recent content in R on Jac TM Davis

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: This is my first post. I use R a lot for my research and wanted somewhere to post all the scripts and bits and pieces that I use. Maybe I’ll get some feedback on the techniques, or maybe some of this stuff will be useful to someone else. I’m trying to keep the workflow simple so I’m using the blogdown package (will learn how to hyperlink later) in RStudio and publishing to a static website hosted on GitHub Pages.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
